title: Heritage Bikaner Palace Stay with Daily Dining
description:
Taste the luxurious life of a maharaja at the pristine palace of Narendra Bhawan Bikaner. A former royal residence, this boutique hotel - located within driving distance of Delhi, Jaipur and Jodhpur - is a perfect amalgamation of luxury, regal ambience and modern comfort. Enjoy your stay with daily chef's choice breakfast, one chef's choice dinner for two adults once during the stay, one glass of beer or wine for two adults once during the stay, a chef's special coffee and cake session once during the stay, 20% discount on dining, drinks, spa and salon services, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

**Travelling with family?** Two kids (aged 11 years and under) stay free with all inclusions, sleeping in existing bedding.
offer_address: Samvit Shikshan Sansthan Rd, Gandhi Colony Samta Nagar, Bikaner 334001

title: Top-Rated Heritage Bikaner Palace Stay with Gourmet Dining
description: Taste the luxurious life of a maharaja at the pristine palace of Narendra Bhawan Bikaner. A former royal residence, this boutique hotel - located within driving distance of Delhi, Jaipur and Jodhpur - is a perfect amalgamation of luxury, regal ambience and modern comfort. Rated the #1 hotel in Bikaner on Tripadvisor and stamped with a Travellers' Choice Award 2020, this grand residence is influenced by Maharaj Narendra Singhji’s extensive travels. From the colours of Bombay to Art Deco touches and influences drawn from the glamour of Broadway, this eclectic hotel is a showcase of opulence.
offer_address: Samvit Shikshan Sansthan Rd, Gandhi Colony Samta Nagar, Bikaner 334001
